title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: The file is saved without a file extension, causing it to be recognized as a generic file instead of a java file. The Navigator displays the file without a file extension.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original unless explicitly changed. The icon should remain as the java file icon. The Navigator should display the file with the appropriate file extension.
SR:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
4) A dialog will appear
5) Browse for a valid container location
6) Type the filename without including the extension, as it is not requested
7) Click Ok

Observe that the Navigator has added the file in the specified location with the correct file extension displayed.
